title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted dark blue silk ornamented with bands of cut steel beads running lengthwise.  One faceted steel band controls side closure.  Cut steel bead tassels at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-51.
